Name: Spiced Cranberry Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: The cloves and the colour add a festive note to this Martini.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly (Simon Difford).
